attributes.action: End the war on the motorist 2025
attributes.additional_details: Billions comes into the treasury each year yet motorists are largely ignored
attributes.background: There are over 30billion drivers easily enough to sway a general election. We’re asking the government to stop the war on the motorist. More and more speed and enforcement cameras. Road closures without any resurfacing. Now talk of pay per mile for ev’s. All while potholes severely are damaging cars

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what you mean by "the war on the motorist".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
